text.title: Furnished City Apartment - Limited to 1 Year
text.description:
This stylishly furnished apartment with 59.5 m2 of living space offers modern living with a lot of comfort - ideal for singles or couples. The apartment, renovated in 2024, is rented for a limited period of one year and is fully furnished. It impresses with a well-thought-out room concept, high-quality furniture, and loving details. The bright living area with a cozy sofa and dining table invites you to linger. The separate, fully equipped kitchen offers everything you need to cook. The bedroom is furnished with a large bed, storage space, and a stylish mirror. A highlight is the quiet balcony with a view of green hedges - perfect for relaxed hours.

Move in, feel good, live - without any furniture stress.

This well-maintained property at Br√ºckfeldstrasse 42 is located in the popular L√§nggassquartier - quiet, green, and yet urban. Within walking distance are various university institutes, several schools (e.g., the L√§nggassschulhaus or the Hochfeld sites), and diverse daycare centers. Shopping opportunities like the "R√ºedu-Hofladen" or other shops on Mittelstrasse are quickly accessible. The connection to public transport is excellent - the main station is reachable in a few minutes. The property also offers practical extras like a covered bicycle stand, cellar compartments, and pleasant seating and lounging areas in the courtyard.

Ideal for all those who want to combine urban life with quiet living comfort.
